rules_text:
Deception {B}{G}{U} [i]({B}{G}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
Menace
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices a planeswalker. Return up to one target planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand.
